content.question: The function ​<math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 9 times 25 to the power of x"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>25</mn><mi>x</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following is an equivalent form for <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3 times 5 to the power of open parentheses x divided by 2 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3 times 5 to the power of open parentheses 2 x close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 9 times 5 to the power of open parentheses x divided by 2 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 9 times 5 to the power of open parentheses 2 x close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 9 times 5 to the power of open parentheses 2 x close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
